name: salt-tool Boilerplate
default_confdir: {% if 'n' == cookiecutter.has_conffile_only %}{{ '.config/' ~ cookiecutter.pkg if cookiecutter.default_xdg == 'y' else '.' ~  cookiecutter.pkg }}{% endif %}
default_confdir_mac: {% if 'n' == cookiecutter.has_conffile_only %}{{ 'Library/Application Support/' ~ cookiecutter.name if cookiecutter.mac_library == 'y' else cookiecutter.default_confdir }}{% endif %}
default_conffile: {% if 'n' == cookiecutter.has_conffile_only or 'y' == cookiecutter.default_xdg %}config{% else %}.{{ cookiecutter.pkg }}{% endif %}
